tool_description: Climate news API that use a web scrapper
name: NewX-ClimateNewsLive
title: NewX-ClimateNewsLive

api_list.name: Get individual News source News
api_list.description: This gets news about climate and climate change from a specific news source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://newx-climatenewslive.p.rapidapi.com/newsx/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "newx-climatenewslive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://newx-climatenewslive.p.rapidapi.com/newsx/{newspaperid}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "newx-climatenewslive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all climate related news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about climate and climate change from all around the world
